description:
Construction of an additional storey (5th floor level) with a roof terrace on the south and east elevations.  Erection of a 4 storey rear extension (floors 1-4), new windows and cladding to the north, south and east elevations and enclosure of rear stairwell.  Change of use of the basement, ground and mezzanine floors from industrial (B2) to food and drink (A3).  Use of the 5th floor as office (B1) 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  1776/E/BAS, 1776/E/01,02,03, 04, 05,06,07,08;  1776/P/BAS/C, 1776/P/OOC,  01C, 02C, 05C, 07C, 09C, 10C, 11C, 13C, 1776-02-106D;1776-04-102E;103D, 1776-27-504B (LBI NO:27922,27924)
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990
